description:
/***WARNING! This update will wipe all your previous weights.  Before updating, make sure to take note of all previously entered weights.  This is the last time an update will do this. Sorry for the inconvenience.***/

Introducing Weight Tracker, the easiest way to watch your weight. Whether you're looking to take off the few extra pounds from Thanksgiving or put on a few more, Weight Tracker is sure to make your life easier by offering:

 - Easy-to-use controls
 - Support for previous dates
 - An intuitive graph view
 - Setting a goal for yourself
 - Adjustable preferences
 - Support for both the Pre and Pixi.

If you have any questions or comments, don't hesitate to e-mail me at .  I hope you enjoy Weight Tracker as much as I enjoyed creating it!
